trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify the subject of the security token.
The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a SamlSubjectStatement.
A SamlSubjectStatement asserts the principal that is the subject of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
This principal is specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement"></xref> class.
This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement"></xref> class using the specified subject.
This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that identifies the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject*> property.
Adds a claim based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
The AddClaimsToList method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject%2A> property.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that contains the set of claims to add to.
claims is .
Creates an authorization policy for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
Use the CreatePolicy method to get an authorization policy for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that represents the issuer of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> to authenticate the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.

An <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that represents an authorization policy for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Causes this instance to be read-only.
When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
Gets or sets the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
The SamlSubject property corresponds to the `<saml:Subject>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that identifies the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
The SamlSubject property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Sets the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.

Unlike the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject%2A> property, the SetSubject method can be called to set the subject of a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `true`.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that identifies the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
samlSubject is .
